description: A production-ready TypeScript MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for Cisco Support APIs with comprehensive security and dual transport support. This extensible server provides access to multiple Cisco Support APIs including Bug Search, Case Management, and End-of-Life information.

SUPPORT_API.description: Enable specific Cisco Support APIs (comma-separated list)

CISCO_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Cisco API Client ID for OAuth2 authentication

MCP_BEARER_TOKEN.description: Custom Bearer token for HTTP authentication (HTTP mode only)

CISCO_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your Cisco API Client Secret for OAuth2 authentication

name: MCP Cisco Support
